discourse_list.title: Method for direct feedback from Uniswap team/devs

content.content: It would be great if we could get a formal communication channel between governance participants and the uniswap dev team so we can learn how we can best vote to assist in things the uniswap team are working on. V3 comes to mind. I’d love to know what proposals would assist in making that a reality, or how we can help in any way. Does anyone have any thoughts on how this might look?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing the creation of a communication channel between governance participants and the Uniswap dev team to learn how to best vote and assist in the development of Uniswap V3. The author is asking for feedback and thoughts on how this communication channel could be established.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: I am in line with you iwearahoodie…
